tool_description: Api that gives coordinates, city names, and country names
name: Geocoding Api
title: Geocoding Api

api_list.name: Geocode by latitude and longitude
api_list.description: Returns name, latitude, longitude, country, and state

api_list.name: Geocode by zip
api_list.description: Returns geolocation data based on zip lookup.

api_list.name: Geocode by query parameter lookup
api_list.description: Returns latitude, longitude, country, state, and name when using the q parameter to lookup information.
